properties.displayName: Enable allLogs category group resource logging for supported resources to Log Analytics
properties.description: Resource logs should be enabled to track activities and events that take place on your resources and give you visibility and insights into any changes that occur. This initiative deploys diagnostic setting using the allLogs category group to route logs to an Event Hub for all supported resources

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Resource Location List to send logs to nearby Log Analytics. A single entry "*" selects all locations (default).
List of Resource Types to be evaluated for diagnostic setting existence.
Destination table type output in Log Analytics Workspace - null (AzureDiagnostics) or Dedicated (Resource Specific)
